revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC 7260 Card |caption2 = |pp = http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/wireless-products/dual-band-wireless-ac-7260-bluetooth.html |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = Dual Band Wireless-AC 7260 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = 7260HMW |page_start_date = 04/05/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_Dual_Band_Wireless-AC_7260_(7260HMW) |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = (half) |vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 08b1 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 4070 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PD97260H, PD97260HU, MSQ7260H |icid = 1000M-7260H |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 0C:8B:FD, FC:F8:AE |chip1 = Intel;W308AK1L; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Bluetooth 4.0 LE, DFS, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/04/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *802.11abgn+ac, 2x2, Dual Band Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.0, Mini PCIe (half) "WP2 P9", "PB # G83449-001", and addl. PCB text (date code '''4712''', Nov. 2012) :is silkscreened on the back of the module in the FCC photos. *FCC ID PD97260H is presumably the standard 7260HMW model. :FCC ID PD97260HU is presumably for the 7260HMW model (7260HMWU?) :for vendors using BIOS lockdown of wireless module. *The '''[[ASUS]]''' FCC ID for this card is [https://fcc.io/MSQ/7260H MSQ7260H]. *The '''[[Dell]]''' FCC ID for this card is [https://fcc.io/E2K/7260WY E2K7260WY]. :Per a CIIPC made 08/19/2013, '''Dell''' appears to be using the modules in certain '''Wyse''' thin clients. The PCI ID used in this entry is for one card of unknown provenance. :It is, however, marked as follows... :*Model: 7260HMW :*TA: G94295-003 :*SPS: 710661-001 0C :*CMIT ID: 2013AJ0758 {{WiFiCert|WFA19658|06/11/2013}} *The card is certified under the following additional IDs... :WFA17147, 11/26/2012, a/b/g/n, 2x2 :WFA19388, 04/15/2013, a/b/g/n, 2x2, w/ WPS and Wi-Fi Direct noted There is an 00:15:00 OUI on the label pictured on the device in the FCC label shots. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.intel.com/content/dam/www/public/us/en/documents/product-briefs/dual-band-wireless-ac-7260-bluetooth-brief.pdf Product Brief] ===Review of Linux Compatibility=== *[http://linux-hardware-guide.com/2015-07-21-intel-wireless-ac-7260-hmwg-wifi-802-11ac-dual-band-bluetooth-hmc Intel Wireless-AC 7260.HMWG] ''(Wi-Fi, 802.11ac, Dual Band, Bluetooth, HMC)'' :The Intel Wireless-AC 7260 is a PCIe Half Mini Card which supports 802.11ac and Bluetooth connections. The card has the PCI ID [http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/8086/08b1 '''8086:08b1'''] :'''lspci''' 
02:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Intel Corporation Wireless 7260 [8086:08b1] (rev 6b)
    Subsystem: Intel Corporation Dual Band Wireless-AC 7260 [8086:c070]
    Kernel driver in use: iwlwifi
    Kernel modules: iwlwifi
:and is fully supported by the Linux kernel (tested under Arch Linux 1.4 with Linux kernel of version 4.1.0). :However, the driver needs a special iwlwifi firmware which is normally part of the Linux distribution (see firmware-iwlwifi). The WiFi driver ('''[[iwlwifi]]''') is loaded automatically: :'''dmesg''' 
Intel(R) Wireless WiFi driver for Linux
Copyright(c) 2003- 2015 Intel Corporation
iwlwifi 0000:02:00.0: enabling device (0000 -> 0002)
iwlwifi 0000:02:00.0: loaded firmware version 25.27.13.0 op_mode iwlmvm
iwlwifi 0000:02:00.0: Detected Intel(R) Dual Band Wireless AC 7260, REV=0x144
iwlwifi 0000:02:00.0: L1 Enabled - LTR Disabled
iwlwifi 0000:02:00.0: L1 Enabled - LTR Disabled
The Bluetooth chipset is internally connected via USB and has the USB ID '''8087:07dc''' :'''lsusb''' 
Bus 002 Device 002: ID 8087:07dc Intel Corp.
The chipset is fully supported and is automatically activated by the kernel: :'''dmesg''' 
Bluetooth: Core ver 2.20
NET: Registered protocol family 31
Bluetooth: HCI device and connection manager initialized
Bluetooth: HCI socket layer initialized
Bluetooth: L2CAP socket layer initialized
Bluetooth: SCO socket layer initialized
